title: Viral: Israeli Soldiers Feel The Heat After Tossing Quran Into Fire; IDF Mulls 'Punishment' | Hindustan Times

Get features like Ad lite A Minimal Ad Experience HT Premium Articles Expertly crafted articles Quickreads Segment News brief in summary format HT E-paper Access digital news experience Start 14 Days Free Trial Home Latest News HT Premium Elections Education India World Cities Entertainment Lifestyle Astrology Real Estate Shop Now Election News Live My First Vote Lok Sabha Election Live Delhi Election 2024 Live Odisha Election 2024 Live IPL 2024 IPL Match Today IPL Purple Cap IPL Orange Cap HTCity The Interview Videos Photos Trending IPL Points Table Web Stories Tech Business Virat Kohli Sports Delhi News Mumbai News Bengaluru News Quickreads Daily Digest Following Election Schedule 2024 Games + 23 more IPL 2024 IPL Match Today IPL Purple Cap IPL Orange Cap HTCity The Interview Videos Photos Trending IPL Points Table Web Stories Tech Business Virat Kohli Sports Delhi News Mumbai News Bengaluru News Quickreads Daily Digest Following Election Schedule 2024 Games News / Videos / Viral: Israeli Soldiers Feel The Heat After Tossing Quran Into Fire; IDF Mulls 'Punishment' Viral: Israeli Soldiers Feel The Heat After Tossing Quran Into Fire; IDF Mulls 'Punishment' videos Published on May 25, 2024 09:01 AM IST Follow Us Follow Us Share Via Copy Link The Israeli military has ordered an investigation into incidents of IDFsoldiers filming themselves burning muslims' holy books, including a Quran, during operations in the Gaza Strip. This after footage of burning of Quran, captured by the soldiers, surfaced online. A video, reportedly taken in the Rafah area, showed a soldier holding a Quran before tossing it into a fire. Watch this video to know more.
